title: Machine Learning Fundamentals Workshop
description: An intensive hands-on workshop covering core ML algorithms and Python libraries (Scikit-learn, Pandas). Perfect for beginners interested in AI and data analysis.

title: Annual AI Hackathon: Generative Models
description: A 48-hour coding marathon focused on building creative applications using large language models, Diffusion Models, and advanced Artificial Intelligence techniques.

title: Data Visualization with Tableau Seminar
description: Learn to transform raw data into insightful, compelling visual stories using Tableau Public and advanced charting techniques. Focus on data science communication.

title: Career Networking Night
description: Meet representatives from top tech companies and alumni. Bring your professional resume and practice your elevator pitch! Essential for job seekers and career growth.

title: Intro to Web Dev (React & Node.js)
description: A crash course introducing modern full-stack web development using the MERN stack for building dynamic applications. Perfect for aspiring software developers.

title: Resume & Interview Skills Bootcamp
description: A hands-on professional development session covering resume optimization, LinkedIn strategy, and mock interview practice for technical and non-technical roles. Boost your job prospects!

title: Outdoor Movie Night: Sci-Fi Classics
description: A relaxing social evening under the stars featuring classic science fiction films. Free popcorn and soft drinks provided. A great way to unwind and meet new friends.

title: Advanced Java and Spring Boot Seminar
description: Deep dive into enterprise-level backend development using advanced Java features, Spring Boot framework, and microservices architecture. Focus on software engineering principles.

title: Stress Buster: Puppy Play & Pizza
description: A mental health and wellness event designed to reduce stress before final exams. Spend time with therapy dogs and enjoy free pizza. Focus on student wellbeing.

title: Competitive Coding Tournament (CP)
description: Test your algorithms and data structures skills in a three-hour competitive programming event. Prizes for top solvers. Essential for Computer Science majors and CP enthusiasts.

title: Introduction to Blockchain Technology
description: A seminar covering the basics of decentralized ledgers, cryptocurrency, smart contracts, and web3 development. Explore the future of technology and finance.

title: Local Volunteer & Community Cleanup Day
description: Join students and alumni to give back to the community by cleaning up the local park. A social event focused on public service and environmental awareness.
venue: Local River Park (Meet at Campus Gate)
